title: Masumoto Suzushiro An
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Monzen-nakacho branch of this company that prepares Japanese bento boxes. The company's main branch is located in Kameido at 2-45-8 Kameido, Koto-ku, Tokyo. Typically offers around 5 varieties of vegan macrobiotic line called "wasei shoku" but in limited quantities, so call ahead or go before the lunch crowd. Take-out, pre-order, or there is a small dining area to eat at the store. Also sells freshly-steamed daikon manju (white radish & vegetable buns). Photos of the contents are posted. Ask for "macrobi bento."  Address in Japanese 東京都江東区富岡1-10-10.
